titleStmt.title: The arraignment of licentious liberty, and oppressing tyranny in a sermon preached before the right honourable House of Peers, in the Abbey-church at Westminster, on the the day of their solemn monethly fast, Febr. 24. 1646 / by Nathanaell Hardy ...
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.L. for Nathanaell Webb and William Grantham ...,
